title: The Tall Lie / For Men Only 1952 | Paul Henreid, Margaret Field, Douglas Kennedy | Full Drama Movie

sources.title: The Tall Lie / For Men Only 1952 | Paul Henreid, Margaret Field, Douglas Kennedy | Full Drama Movie
sources.description:
KISS by KISS...It's today's most shocking scandal!
A college professor begins to suspect that a student's accidental death was tied to his refusal to take part in a traditional "hazing" and was no accident.

Original title: For Men Only (1952)  AKA: The Tall Lie / Hell Night

Colorized version https://youtu.be/RgKe0yo-NjI

Director: Paul Henreid
Writers: Herb Margolis, Lou Morheim
Stars: Paul Henreid, Margaret Field, James Dobson, Douglas Kennedy
Genres: Crime, Drama


0:00 A Gripping Tale of Fraternity Initiation and its Consequences: Tall Lie / For Men Only (1952)
01:40  A person recounts their experiences as a pledge in a fraternity, including physical and emotional hazing.
16:22  A mother visits her son's professor to discuss his fraternity initiation and signs an affidavit to release the fraternity from responsibility.
22:02  A controversial fraternity initiation involves the killing of a dog, leading to an investigation.
34:05  A person is defending their friend's story and expressing disbelief at the current state of their school.
47:11  A tragic accident occurs during a fraternity initiation, leading to a debate about hazing and its consequences.
52:46  A discussion takes place regarding fraternity hazing and the potential consequences of opposing it.
59:52  A conversation between two people reveals a strained relationship and the desire for proof of love.
1:08:31  A person recounts a conversation where someone talked about their wife leaving them and accused the person of understanding them.
1:18:54  A phone call leads to confusion and suspicion.
1:26:21  A conversation takes place about a student who applied for leave of absence and another student who went to pick up his tuxedo for a formal event.

@CultCinemaClassics
